sharedQuizzes.title: Sample Quiz - Database Basics
sharedQuizzes.content:
1. (LO 1.1) Which of the following best describes a Database?

A. A collection of unrelated data

B. An organized collection of structured information

C. A single file containing text

D. A spreadsheet application

2. (LO 1.2) What does SQL stand for?

A. Simple Query Language

B. Structured Query Language

C. System Quality Language

D. Standard Question Language

1B2B

questions.text: Which of the following best describes a Database?

options.label: B
options.text: An organized collection of structured information
